T02D1269:41b-20: sta gon gyi lha la mchod pa dang /
T02D1269:41b-22: bdud rtsi'i cho ga byas la /
T02D1269:41b-23: aom a'a: h'um dzny'a na mandala mu: zhes brjod la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1269:41b-24: h'um zhes brjod pas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dbang du bsdus la /
T02D1269:41b-25: mdun du h'um mthing nag cig bsam /
T02D1269:41b-26: de las 'od phyogs bcur spros par bsam /
T02D1269:41b-27: aom raksha raksha h'um zhes brjod pas /
T02D1269:41b-28: rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs pa bsam /

T02D1269:41b-30: ras kyi srad bu sngon po dang /
T02D1269:41b-36: dngul gyi snod dris bsgos pa'i nang du bzhag la /
T02D1269:41b-41: kham ljang gu rim pa bzhin du bsam /
T02D1269:41b-42: de nas slob dpon bdag dbus su gnas la dgyes pa rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin du bsgoms la /
T02D1269:41b-43: mig g-yas su ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor g-yon du ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
T02D1269:41b-44: aom d'ipta drishti aam ku sha dza: zhes bzlas pas
T02D1269:41b-45: lcags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od zer phyir byung nas dgyes
T02D1269:41b-46: pa rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs lnga mdun gyi
T02D1269:41b-48: de la 'di skad gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1269:41b-49: kye bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa'i rdo rje srad bu stsal du gsol zhes brjod do //
T02D1269:41b-50: de nas ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas /
T02D1269:42a-0: dgyes pa rdo rje la sogs pa'i thugs ka nas lcags kyus @42a * //
T02D1269:42a-1: bskul ba'i tshul du ye shes kyi skud pa lnga byung ste /
T02D1269:42a-2: dam tshig gi skud pa la so sor thim par bsam mo //
T02D1269:42a-4: phan tshun rjes su rdzogs pa kun //
T02D1269:42a-5: phan tshun rjes su chos thams cad //
T02D1269:42a-6: yang dag dgug pa'i chos thams cad //
T02D1269:42a-7: chos shes dang po dran nas bsgril //
T02D1269:42a-8: zhes brjod la bsgril bar bya'o //
T02D1269:42a-9: de nas tsandan bzang po la sogs pas skud pa
T02D1269:42a-10: gser gyi snod la sogs pa'i nang du legs par
T02D1269:42a-11: bzhag la // slob dpon dbus su 'dug la /
T02D1269:42a-12: me tog la sogs pas thig la mchod de /

T02D1269:42a-14: dgyes pa rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bya'o //
T02D1269:42a-15: aom he dz'a: zhes pa ci nus brjod nas /
T02D1269:42a-16: bdag gi snying ga nas grogs po goo r'i'i tshul
T02D1269:42a-17: du sprul nas byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur
T02D1269:42a-18: bar bya'o // de nas mdun du 'dug par bsams la /

T02D1269:42a-21: bdag gi lag pa g-yas pas blangs te /
T02D1269:42a-22: grogs po'i lag par gtad par bya'o //

T02D1269:42a-25: nas blangs te slob dpon gyi mdun du 'dug go

T02D1269:42a-27: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gnam thig gdab po //
T02D1269:42a-28: de la slob dpon nub tu 'dug la kha shar du bltas la /
T02D1269:42a-29: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod cing thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1269:42a-30: de bzhin du slob don lhor 'dug la byang du kha bltas te /
T02D1269:42a-33: de nas tshon sna lnga'i srad bu gnyis pa blangs te /
T02D1269:42a-34: snga ma bzhin dus thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1269:42a-35: slob dpon dang slob ma gnyis bskor phyogs ni g-yas su bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1269:42a-37: de nas gsher thig blangs la mtshan ma'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1269:42a-39: tshangs thig gnyis gdab pa ni gnam thig dang mthun te /
T02D1269:42b-0: de nas mer gnas la byang du bltas te shar du gdab @42b po //
T02D1269:42b-1: de nas rlung du gnas la lhor bltas te nub tu gdab po //
T02D1269:42b-2: de kar 'dug la shar du bltas te byang du gdab po //
T02D1269:42b-3: yang mer 'dug la nub tu bltas te lhor gdab po //
T02D1269:42b-4: de kar 'dug la rlung du bltas te mtshams dang po gdab po //
T02D1269:42b-5: yang bden bral du 'dug la dbang ldan du bltas la mtshams gnyis pa gdab par bya'o //
T02D1269:42b-7: drug gi char ni bgo bar bya //
T02D1269:42b-8: dbang po drug pa nang gnyis dor //
T02D1269:42b-9: gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi bzhir dbye //
T02D1269:42b-10: bzhi pa ma bgos par ni gzhag / lnga pa yi ni dbus ma dor //
T02D1269:42b-11: rta babs man chad khol mos bya //
T02D1269:42b-12: rdo rje ra ba me ri gnyis //
T02D1269:42b-13: tshad dang mthun par bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1269:42b-14: de nas ye shes kyi thig skud kyang snga ma bzhin du mchod nas /
T02D1269:42b-15: aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes brjod pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D1269:42b-16: thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi //
T02D1269:42b-17: zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag las shes par bya'o //
T02D1269:42b-19: de la tshon dgyed pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D1269:42b-21: 'bras s'a lu btags pa'i phye ma kha dog lngar bsgyur ba'am /

T02D1269:42b-23: ye shes kyi skud pa la yig 'bru ji ltar bkod pa bzhin du /
T02D1269:42b-25: ye shes kyi skud pa bkug nas bstims pa bzhin du tshon la yang de bzhin bya'o //
T02D1269:42b-26: de nas mchod pa lnga phul nas /
T02D1269:42b-27: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i sngas tshon la lan bdun bzlas shing /
T02D1269:42b-28: tshon rtsi la 'bar ba'i mig gis blta bar bya'o //
T02D1269:42b-29: 'bar ba'i mig ni myur bar g-yo ba'i mig go //
T02D1269:42b-30: de nas yi ge hi zlos shig / rdo rje padma'i phyag rgyas mtshon nas bya'o //
T02D1269:42b-31: de nas tshon bzang por bya ba'i phyir bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs brjod do //
T02D1269:42b-32: bden pa gang gis sems can rnams la /
T02D1269:42b-33: sangs rgyas rnams sems can du dpag pas /
T02D1269:42b-34: chags par mdzad pa'i bden pa des //
T02D1269:42b-35: tshon rtsi 'bar bar gyur cig ces bya'o //
T02D1269:42b-38: chos dbyings rang bzhin dag pa ste //
T02D1269:42b-39: sems can khams ni sbyong bar byed //

T02D1269:43a-0: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan gyi @43a * //

T02D1269:43a-34: de nas gam tsam la sogs pa so so'i snying
T02D1269:43a-35: po brjod la mkha' las bton te so so'i gnas
T02D1269:43a-37: de ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o //
T02D1269:43a-38: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bya ba ni /
T02D1269:43a-41: goo r'i lcags kyu can gyis dgug / tsoo r'i h'um zhes pa brjod pas /

T02D1269:43a-47: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1269:43b-0: so so'i @43b rigs kyi bdag mos dbang bskur bar bya'o //

T02D1269:43b-31: d'a ya h'um zhes brjod cing be t'a l'i la

T02D1269:43b-33: tam sv'a d'a ya h'um zhes brjod cing pukka s'i

T02D1269:43b-36: brjod cings pa r'i la dbul /

T02D1269:44a-1: padma'i phyag rgyas phud blangs la /

T02D1269:44a-21: mchod pa'i dus su rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya /

T02D1269:44a-28: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la gnyis te /

T02D1269:44b-5: a'atma n'am ni rysha ta a'a mi te he badzra

T02D1269:44b-15: sarba ba ye bya zhes brjod pas slob ma bsrung ngo //

T02D1269:44b-19: dad pa rnams la ni ma yin no //

T02D1269:44b-28: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ka p'a la /

T02D1269:44b-38: ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes gang gis /

T02D1269:45a-2: snying 'gas byas nas dral nas gshegs //
T02D1269:45a-3: aom badzra sa tva h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D1269:45a-4: de nas dud tshos sam nya phyis la sogs par chu blugs la //
T02D1269:45a-5: de'i nang du gur kum dang /
T02D1269:45a-7: sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa blugs /
T02D1269:45a-8: bdud rtsi lnga yang blugs la h'um gis sbyang /
T02D1269:45a-10: aom gyis spel zhing 'bar bar byas /
T02D1269:45a-11: de nas badzrod ka ma h'a badzra /
T02D1269:45a-14: lag pa g-yas su sbyin par bya /
T02D1269:45a-16: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1269:45a-17: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02D1269:45a-18: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob //
T02D1269:45a-19: 'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu /
T02D1269:45a-20: aom badzra au da ka tha tha tha zhes brjod do //
T02D1269:45a-21: de nas dam tshig brtan par gyur nas /
T02D1269:45a-22: slob ma la 'di skad ces bsgo ste /
T02D1269:45a-23: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyi //
T02D1269:45a-24: phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02D1269:45a-25: ngas 'di byos shig byas pa gang yin pa bya dgos so //
T02D1269:45a-26: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D1269:45a-27: ya nga ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas
T02D1269:45a-28: / dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do //
T02D1269:45a-29: de nas slob mas 'di skad smra bar bya ste /
T02D1269:45a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs
T02D1269:45a-31: la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab tu gsol
T02D1269:45a-33: de nas slob dpon gyis pa rdo rjer bsgoms la /
T02D1269:45a-34: dbab snod snang ba mtha' yas su bsgoms la /
T02D1269:45a-35: de'i rkang mthil 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan par bsgom /
T02D1269:45a-36: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum bsam /
T02D1269:45a-37: de'i steng du dza: h'um kha dog dmar po cig bsam /
T02D1269:45a-38: de nas snying gar lam ser po las dbang chen
T02D1269:45a-39: gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po cig bsam
T02D1269:45a-40: / de'i steng du h'um mthing nag cig bsgom /
T02D1269:45a-41: mgrin par pam dkar po las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po cig bsgom /
T02D1269:45a-42: de'i spyi bor yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam sngon po cig bsam /
T02D1269:45a-43: de'i steng du ha dkar po cig bsam /
T02D1269:45a-44: de nas snying gnas 'od 'phros pa las phyogs bcu'i sku gsung thugs kyi lha spyan drangs la /
T02D1269:45b-1: de nas spros la aom a'a be sha /
T02D1269:45b-2: tutte sam he badzra gha ma /
T02D1269:45b-3: ma nu ta ram zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D1269:45b-4: la me la spos bor te slob ma la bskor
T02D1269:45b-6: me tog gi phreng ba yang lag pa g-yas par byin la /
T02D1269:45b-7: aom a'a be sha a'a be sha /
T02D1269:45b-10: tsa le ha tsa le ya h'um aa ha dzheem sv'ah'a zhes brjod la /
T02D1269:45b-14: dza: h'um gi 'do zer rkang mthil nas snying gar zhugs pas mi dge ba la sogs pa shes /
T02D1269:45b-16: spyi bor zhugs pas lus mi brtan zhing 'phar ro //
T02D1269:45b-17: de nas tishtha badzra zhes brjod nas 'phar ba gzung bas brtan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1269:45b-18: de nas lce la a'a: dmar po bsams la /
T02D1269:45b-19: gsungs shig rdo rje dge mi dge / zhes brjod pas legs nyes kun smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1269:45b-20: de nas mig dga' pa'i ras kyi phreng ba las me tog phyung ste /
T02D1269:45b-21: slob ma'i lag tu gtad la /
T02D1269:45b-22: pra t'i tstsha badzra ho: zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor du dor ro //
T02D1269:45b-23: de nas slob dpon gyis blangs nas /
T02D1269:45b-24: stobs po che 'di long shig byas la slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1269:45b-26: dri med yid 'ong ldan pa yis //
T02D1269:45b-27: khyod kyi mig gis ji ltar mthong /
T02D1269:45b-28: dkar po dag ni mthong gyur na //
T02D1269:45b-30: ser po dag ni mthong gyur na //
T02D1269:45b-32: dmar po dag ni mthong gyur na //
T02D1269:45b-34: nag po dag ni mthong gyur na //
T02D1269:45b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis khyod //
T02D1269:45b-37: di ring nan tan mig phye'o //
T02D1269:45b-39: aom he badzra sva yanti de /
T02D1269:45b-44: badzra tsa kru ra buddha ram zhes brjod la gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D1269:45b-45: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus nas byang gi sgo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du lha ngo bstan par bya'o //
T02D1269:45b-46: de nas slob mas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byed du bcug la /
T02D1269:45b-47: rdo rje slob dpon la phyag lan gsum byed du
T02D1269:45b-48: gzhug / dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum bya
T02D1269:45b-49: / rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab /
T02D1269:46a-0: @46a * // de nas bdag bu dang chung ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1269:46a-1: rta dang ma he la sogs pa'i rkang bzhi pa dang /
T02D1269:46a-2: gser dngul la sogs pa'i rin po che dang /
T02D1269:46a-3: zhing dag grong la sogs pa rten dang /
T02D1269:46a-4: dar dang mu men la sogs pa'i bgo ba dang /
T02D1269:46a-5: sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang /
T02D1269:46a-6: rgun chang dang 'bras chang la sogs pa'i btung ba dang /
T02D1269:46a-7: ci la dgyes pa la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1269:46a-8: de ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1269:46a-10: // / dbang bskur ba'i thabs la yang gnyis te /
T02D1269:46a-12: phyi la yang bcu gcig ste /
T02D1269:46a-14: de nas slob mas zhu bar bya ste /
T02D1269:46a-15: ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la //
T02D1269:46a-16: rdo rje sems dpas dbar bskur ldan //
T02D1269:46a-17: yon tan ldan pas brtser dgongs nas //
T02D1269:46a-18: rig pa'i dbang rnams bdag la stsol //
T02D1269:46a-20: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sogs pa bum pa rnams nas chu bsdus la /
T02D1269:46a-21: dung phor nang du blugs te mi bskyod pa 'ba' zhig tu mos pa byas te /
T02D1269:46a-22: de la mchod bstod byas nas 'od du zhu bar bsam mo //
T02D1269:46a-23: de nas dgyes pa rdo rje'i gnas gsum nas 'od
T02D1269:46a-24: zer las sprul pa nam mkha' khyab pa byung bar
T02D1269:46a-25: bsam / sprul pa'i lha mo rin po che'i bum pa thogs nas /
T02D1269:46a-26: byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun gyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
T02D1269:46a-27: bdag gis kyang dung phor gyi chu blangs la /
T02D1269:46a-28: aom badzra ka la sha aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D1269:46a-29: zhes brjod chu'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D1269:46a-30: spyi gtsug tu mi bskyod pa bsam mo //
T02D1269:46a-31: de nas gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan la las
T02D1269:46a-32: thams cad pa'i bum pa'i chus gtor la dbu rgyan
T02D1269:46a-33: stong par bsgoms / de las tr'am ser por gyur /
T02D1269:46a-34: de las rin chen 'byung ldan zhal gsum phyag drug par gyur te /
T02D1269:46a-35: de las dbu rgyan byung bar bsam /
T02D1269:46a-36: aom mu ku ta aa bhi shinytsa mi zhes ba rjod pas /
T02D1269:46a-37: dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur bas /
T02D1269:46a-38: rna ltag g-yas par rin chen 'byung ldan 'byung bar bsam /
T02D1269:46a-39: de nas rdo rje la las thams cad pa'i chus gtor la /
T02D1269:46a-41: de las dzri'am dmar por gyur /
T02D1269:46a-42: de las snang ba mtha' yas zhal gsum phyag drug pa gcig tu gyur /
T02D1269:46b-0: de nas rdo rje byung bar bsams la 'di skad @46b brjod do //
T02D1269:46b-1: rdo rje yis kyang dbang bskur te //
T02D1269:46b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D1269:46b-3: de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas //
T02D1269:46b-4: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1269:46b-5: dngos grub phyir ni rdo rje zung //
T02D1269:46b-7: slob ma'i snying gar lan gsum gtugs la lag pa g-yas par byin la /
T02D1269:46b-8: aom h'um badzra aa bhi shinytsa mi zhes brjod cing dbang bskur bas /
T02D1269:46b-9: ltag par snang ba mtha' yas 'byung bar bsam mo //
T02D1269:46b-10: de nas dril bu la las thams cad pa'i chus gtor la stong par bsam /
T02D1269:46b-11: de las kham ljang gur gyur /
T02D1269:46b-12: de las don yod grub pa zhal gsum phyag drug bar gyur par bsams la 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1269:46b-13: gnyis med dngos po shes rab thabs //
T02D1269:46b-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid can //
T02D1269:46b-15: lag pa g-yon par 'di zung shig /'khyud nas kun nas sbyar nas ni //
T02D1269:46b-16: rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i dngos por 'dug / ces brjod la /
T02D1269:46b-17: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti sar+ya /
T02D1269:46b-18: aa bhi shinytsa mi na ya ka / zhes brjod
T02D1269:46b-19: cing lag pa g-yon par dril bu byin nas dbang
T02D1269:46b-20: bskur bas / rna ltag g-yas par don yod grub pa byung bar bsam mo //
T02D1269:46b-21: de nas rdo rje dang dril bu la /
T02D1269:46b-22: las thams cad pa'i chus gtor zhing stong par bsam /
T02D1269:46b-23: de las yi ge h'um dkar por gyur /
T02D1269:46b-24: de las rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum phyag drug par gyur /
T02D1269:46b-25: de las rdo rje dril bur byung bar bsams la /
T02D1269:46b-26: slob ma'i mtshog mar bzung la /
T02D1269:46b-27: aom shr'i n'a ma aa bhi shinytsa mi zhes brjod pas /
T02D1269:46b-28: me tog gang la phog pa'i rigs kyi lha'i ming gdags so //
T02D1269:46b-29: ming btags pas mtshog mar rnam par snang mdzad byung bar bsam mo //
T02D1269:46b-30: de nas rdo rje la las thams cad pa'i chus gtor la stong par bsam /
T02D1269:46b-31: de las h'um mthing nag tu gyur /
T02D1269:46b-32: de las rdo rje 'od 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par bsams te /
T02D1269:46b-33: slob dpon gyi lag par rdo rje blangs la 'di skad do //
T02D1269:46b-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1269:46b-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis rtag tu bcang bar bya //
T02D1269:46b-36: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D1269:46b-38: rdo rje rtse mo slob mas gzung /
T02D1269:46b-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D1269:46b-41: tishtha ae sha tvam dha r'a ya mi sv'a h'a /
T02D1269:46b-42: hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod la /
T02D1269:47a-1: lag tu byin la 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1269:47a-2: thog ma tha ma med sems dpa'i //
T02D1269:47a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D1269:47a-4: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag / rdo rje snying po bdag po'i gtso //
T02D1269:47a-5: zhes brjod la lag tu gtad do //
T02D1269:47a-7: las thams cad pa'i chus gtor la stong par bsam /
T02D1269:47a-9: a'a: las dril bur gyur par bsams la 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1269:47a-10: 'di ni mchog gi dngos po yin //
T02D1269:47a-11: shes rab sgyu mar gyur pa'o //
T02D1269:47a-12: rtag tu khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02D1269:47a-13: thog ma byang chub rgyal bas gzung //
T02D1269:47a-14: rdo rje mchog gi ye shes ni //
T02D1269:47a-15: mi phyed nam mkha' lta bu'i gzugs //
T02D1269:47a-16: zhes brjod la slob ma'i lag pa g-yon par sbyin /
T02D1269:47a-17: de nas rdo rje thugs kar gzung /
T02D1269:47a-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur gsal bar bsgom /
T02D1269:47a-21: mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang stsol cig / dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang //
T02D1269:47a-22: slob dpon gyi ni las rnams stsol //
T02D1269:47a-23: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid //
T02D1269:47a-24: ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1269:47a-25: de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1269:47a-26: lha'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1269:47a-27: slob dpon gyi las bshad pas /
T02D1269:47a-28: de'i don slob mas rtogs nas /
T02D1269:47a-29: 'khor ba las mi zlogs [*zlog] par bsam mo //
T02D1269:47a-30: de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D1269:47a-31: de nas lag par 'khor lo byin la /
T02D1269:47a-32: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02D1269:47a-33: sems can rnams la phan bya'i phyir //
T02D1269:47a-35: de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1269:47a-37: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02D1269:47a-40: rgya gram rnams lag tu byin zhing gong ma'i tshigs bcad brjod do //
T02D1269:47a-41: de ni bka' stsal ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D1269:47a-42: de nas mdun na gnas pa'i slob ma /
T02D1269:47a-43: sna bug g-yas pa nas nang du bcug nas /
T02D1269:47a-44: thig le'i 'od zer rlung gi 'od zer gyis bsgribs pa dag par bsams nas /
T02D1269:47a-45: sna bug g-yon pa nas phyir phyung la mdun du bzhag ste lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D1269:47a-46: bdag sh'akya thub par bsgoms la /
T02D1269:47a-47: khu tshur g-yon pa snying gar chos gos mtha' nas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D1269:47a-48: g-yas pa mchod sbyin gyi tshul du byas te /
T02D1269:47b-1: khyod ni bdag gis lung bstan bya //
T02D1269:47b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rdor sems yin //
T02D1269:47b-3: sems can thar pa grub don du //
T02D1269:47b-4: ngan 'gro rnams ni drang bar bgyis //
T02D1269:47b-5: yang dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod //
T02D1269:47b-6: khams gsum gyi ni thub pa khyod //
T02D1269:47b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1269:47b-8: 'phags pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu //
T02D1269:47b-9: dgra bcom pa ni yang dag pa'i //
T02D1269:47b-10: byang chub tu ni khyod lung bstan //
T02D1269:47b-11: phyag rgya chen po'i 'bras bu rab //
T02D1269:47b-12: 'di gsungs pa ni khyod kyis rnyed //
T02D1269:47b-14: de ni lung bstan pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D1269:47b-15: de nas dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1269:47b-16: ji ltar zhugs pa'i slob ma rnams //
T02D1269:47b-18: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su ni //
T02D1269:47b-19: khyed rnams skye bar the tshom med //
T02D1269:47b-20: sdig pa thams cad med pa ni //
T02D1269:47b-21: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pas //
T02D1269:47b-22: bde chen theg pa 'di las ni //
T02D1269:47b-23: phyi nas shi 'pho yod med de //
T02D1269:47b-24: srid pa yang dag dngos grub yin //
T02D1269:47b-25: srid dang mya ngan 'das bor ro //
T02D1269:47b-26: mi gnas mya ngan 'das khyod yin //
T02D1269:47b-27: de ni dbugs dbyung ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D1269:47b-28: rdo rjer rab gnas rdo rje nyid //
T02D1269:47b-29: cha dang dril bu chen po gzung //
T02D1269:47b-30: de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur //
T02D1269:47b-31: slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis //
T02D1269:47b-32: zhes dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las 'byung ngo //
T02D1269:47b-33: de'i 'og tu dam tshig sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1269:47b-34: dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di //
T02D1269:47b-35: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02D1269:47b-36: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang //
T02D1269:47b-37: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
T02D1269:47b-38: gnod par byed la byams pa bskyed //
T02D1269:47b-39: rdo rje spun la bsnyen bkur bya //
T02D1269:47b-40: dad pa can la smad mi bya //
T02D1269:47b-41: slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya //
T02D1269:47b-42: rang bdag yongs su bor nas ni //
T02D1269:47b-43: dka' thub sdug bsngal mi bya'o //
T02D1269:47b-44: ji ltar bde ba bde bzung nas //
T02D1269:47b-47: de ni phyi'i dbang gi dam tshig go //
T02D1269:47b-48: de nas gos dang bza' ba sna tshogs dang /
T02D1269:47b-50: slob ma'i mdun du bzhag la /
T02D1269:47b-51: gos lha'i na bza' panytsa li ka la sogs par byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D1269:47b-52: bza' ba dang btung ba bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1269:48a-2: bla mas bkra shis kyi glu blang bar bya'o //
T02D1269:48a-4: nang gi dbang la yang gsum ste /
T02D1269:48a-6: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bzhi pa'o //
T02D1269:48a-7: de yang rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su /
T02D1269:48a-8: gsang ba'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa zhig byas la /
T02D1269:48a-11: grva bzhir mda' bzhi btsugs la ras kyi yol ba bya'o //
T02D1269:48a-12: de'i steng du phying dkar dang ras dkar po bting ngo //
T02D1269:48a-13: de'i steng du phyi nang gi me tog dgram mo //
T02D1269:48a-14: de nas zhu ba byas te /
T02D1269:48a-15: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02D1269:48a-16: mchod pa ji ltar phul ba bzhin //
T02D1269:48a-17: bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02D1269:48a-18: nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02D1269:48a-19: byang chub rdo rje dpa' chen po //
T02D1269:48a-20: gsang ba'i dbang ni bdag la stsol //
T02D1269:48a-21: ye shes bdud rtsi bdag la stsol //
T02D1269:48a-22: rdo rje'i 'byung ba bdag la stsol //
T02D1269:48a-24: de nas shes rab ma lo bcu drug lon pa /
T02D1269:48a-28: ga bur la sogs pa'i chus bkrus la /
T02D1269:48a-29: dar la sogs pa dri ma med pa dang /
T02D1269:48a-30: rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan la /
T02D1269:48a-31: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag la /
T02D1269:48a-32: bdag med mar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1269:48a-33: mig la sogs pa gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs par byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1269:48a-34: lus ngag yid gsum mkha' spyod ma la sogs par byin gyis brlab /
T02D1269:48a-35: yan lag lnga rigs lngar byin gyis brlab /
T02D1269:48a-37: rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par bsams la /
T02D1269:48a-38: de la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod /
T02D1269:48a-40: gnyis su med par 'khyud par bya'o //
T02D1269:48a-41: de nas aa nu r'a ga'i sngags brjod /
T02D1269:48a-42: bskyod tsam na h'um gi glu blangs /
T02D1269:48a-43: bde ba babs tsam na p'u dza'i sngags brjod /
T02D1269:48a-44: de nas byang chub kyi sems glang po che'i lag
T02D1269:48a-45: pas bha ga nas brus la dung chos su blugs
T02D1269:48a-46: la / srin mtheb kyi phyag rgyas blangs la /
T02D1269:48a-48: slob mas aa ho su kha bde'o zhes brjod la /
T02D1269:48a-49: rtog pa med par btung ngo //
T02D1269:48a-50: ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D1269:48a-51: byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba /
T02D1269:48a-52: bdag gi gsang ba'i dbang gis ni /
T02D1269:48a-53: sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D1269:48a-54: zhes dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las byung ngo //
T02D1269:48a-55: de ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D1269:48a-56: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su shes rab
T02D1269:48a-57: ye shes kyi dbang mandala gru bzhi pa zhig la
T02D1269:48a-58: 'dom gang ba cig byas tsandan la sogs pa dang
T02D1269:48b-0: / dri chen gyis byug / de'i steng du phying dkar ram dar @48b dkar gding /
T02D1269:48b-1: phyi nang gi me tog dgram /
T02D1269:48b-2: shes rab ma byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1269:48b-3: mchod pa la sogs pa snga ma dang mthun /
T02D1269:48b-4: de nas zhu ba bya ste /
T02D1269:48b-5: ye shes bde ba'i gnas bzhugs pa //
T02D1269:48b-7: a'a li k'a li gnyis bdag can //
T02D1269:48b-8: legs dgyes bde mtsho rgyal gyur cig / mchog dang chad pa'i dbus su ni //
T02D1269:48b-9: rol mdzad khyod ni rgyal gyur cig / mchog gi dbang phyug khyod kyis ni //
T02D1269:48b-10: shes rab ye shes dbang bdag stsol //
T02D1269:48b-12: de nas slob dpon gyis shes rab ma'i lag pa
T02D1269:48b-13: g-yas pa slob ma'i lag pa g-yon par byin la
T02D1269:48b-15: 'di ni khyod bzung bzang ba yin //
T02D1269:48b-16: rjes su mthun par sangs rgyas gsung //
T02D1269:48b-17: ye shes gsum gyi rim pa yis //
T02D1269:48b-18: dam pa bde ba myor [*myong] byed cing //
T02D1269:48b-19: sangs rgyas rin chen snod kyi ni //
T02D1269:48b-20: g-yon ngos nas ni rtsa yi gnas //
T02D1269:48b-21: de yi kha khva mu kha dngos //
T02D1269:48b-22: rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma nyid yin //
T02D1269:48b-23: thabs gzhan dag gis byang chub ni //
T02D1269:48b-24: nam yang rnyed par yong mi 'gyur //
T02D1269:48b-25: de bas lhan cig mi gnas pa //
T02D1269:48b-26: dus 'di thams cad ma byed cig /
T02D1269:48b-27: de nas shes rab mas 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1269:48b-28: dri chen dri chu za ba 'di //
T02D1269:48b-29: kye bu khyod kyis nus sam ci //
T02D1269:48b-30: rakta shu kra sha chen dang //
T02D1269:48b-31: bud med brtul zhugs de bzhin no //
T02D1269:48b-33: kye bu smos dang ji lta bu //
T02D1269:48b-36: lha mo bdag gis ci mi nus //
T02D1269:48b-37: rakta shu kra sogs za nus //
T02D1269:48b-38: rtag tu bud med brtul zhugs bgyid //
T02D1269:48b-39: bhag [*bha ga?] yang ni 'jib par bya'o //
T02D1269:48b-40: de nas shes rab mas smras pa /
T02D1269:48b-41: bde ba thams cad 'dug sa ni //
T02D1269:48b-42: bdag gi pad rgyas ae ma'o //
T02D1269:48b-43: gang 'dir rab tu byed pa yang //
T02D1269:48b-44: ji ltar padma'i don gyis shig / ces brjod do //
T02D1269:48b-45: de nas slob mas bha ga la 'o byas nas /
T02D1269:48b-46: 'khyud de gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba byas nas /
T02D1269:48b-47: byang chub sems phab nas man ngag gis bzung ste /
T02D1269:48b-48: ye shes nyams su myong ba de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02D1269:48b-49: dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1269:48b-50: lha mo dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma //
T02D1269:48b-51: sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma //
T02D1269:48b-52: khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che //
T02D1269:48b-53: khyer la mchod pa dag par byin //
T02D1269:48b-55: de ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo /
T02D1269:48b-57: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su /
T02D1269:48b-58: bzhi pa'i dbang gi mandala 'dom gang ba zhig byas la /
T02D1269:48b-60: byang chub sems kyi chag chag btab la /
T02D1269:48b-61: de'i steng du phying dkar la sogs pa dang /
T02D1269:49a-1: la sogs pa gong ma dang mthun par bya'o //
T02D1269:49a-2: de nas slob mas 'di skad zhu'o //
T02D1269:49a-3: reg bya nang bdag nyid phyag 'tshal //
T02D1269:49a-5: reg bya nang grol phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1269:49a-6: reg bya nang sbyin phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1269:49a-7: zhi ba'i dbang bskur mchog 'di ni //
T02D1269:49a-8: mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la stsol //
T02D1269:49a-10: de nas gu rus 'di skad brjod do //
T02D1269:49a-11: khyod kyis srog chags gsad par gyis //
T02D1269:49a-12: khyod kyis brdzun du smra bar bya //
T02D1269:49a-13: ma byin par yang khyod kyis long //
T02D1269:49a-14: gzhan gyi bur med spyad par gyis //
T02D1269:49a-15: de rnams byas na sdig med cing //
T02D1269:49a-17: de rnams khyod kyis nus na ni //
T02D1269:49a-18: bzhi pa'i dbang ni sbyin par bya //
T02D1269:49a-20: khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin la /
T02D1269:49a-21: mgon po chen po bdag gis nus //
T02D1269:49a-23: de nas gnyis su med par 'khyud nas /
T02D1269:49a-24: sbyor ba byas nas bde ba chen po rig ma'i pho brang du phab nas /
T02D1269:49a-25: gyen la rtog med ma'i khar bzlog ste bzung nas /
T02D1269:49a-26: mi rtog pa'i ye shes nyams su myong ba ni rten can gyi bzhi pa'o //
T02D1269:49a-27: rten med pa'i bzhi pa ni /
T02D1269:49a-28: bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o //
T02D1269:49a-29: ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing //
T02D1269:49a-30: rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil lta bur //
T02D1269:49a-31: rdul bral mthar phyin zhi ba nyid //
T02D1269:49a-32: khyod rang yang ni de yi pha //
T02D1269:49a-33: zhes dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las 'byung ngo //
T02D1269:49a-34: de dag ni dbang bskur ba'i thabs so /
T02D1269:49a-36: // / bum pa'i lha gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02D1269:49a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D1269:49a-38: bum pa'i lha gshegs su gsol ba ni /
T02D1269:49a-39: bum pa la mchod bstod byas la /
T02D1269:49a-40: aom a'a: h'um dzny'a na mandala mu: zhes brjod la gshegs su gsol /
T02D1269:49a-41: dkyil 'khor lha yang de dang mthun /
T02D1269:49a-42: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba la yang gnyis te dkyil 'khor gyi lha bsdu ba dang /
T02D1269:49a-44: dkyil 'khor gyi lha bsdu ba ni /
T02D1269:49a-46: dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'od kyi tshul du bsdus nas /
T02D1269:49a-47: thugs ka'i h'um la bsdus bdag dang gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02D1269:49a-48: rdul tshon bsdu ba ni aa k'a ro'i sngags bzlas shing ra ri med par bya'o //
T02D1269:49a-49: bsdus la chu chen po la dor ro //
T02D1269:49a-50: bgegs bsrung ba la la sogs pa 'dod pa yod na sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1269:49a-51: dngos grub mi yal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1269:49a-52: dri'i chus dkyil 'khor du mandala byas la /
T02D1269:49a-53: lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa'i me tog dgod do //
